Package org.forgerock.openam.audit.servlet

Class AuditableHttpServletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • jakarta.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      • jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
        • org.forgerock.openam.audit.servlet.AuditableHttpServletResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, jakarta.servlet.ServletResponse
    public class AuditableHttpServletResponse
extends jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
    HttpServletResponse decorator used for capturing response status and message.
    Since:
    13.0.0
